skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Experience with React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Building responsive interfaces and learning modern design principles for engaging user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Familiar with Python and Flask for server-side programming. Learning to create APIs and work with SQLite databases for effective data management.

skills.title: Full-Stack Integration
skills.description: Academic experience in Python, JavaScript, Java, and C/C++. Eager to apply these languages in practical, real-world projects.

skills.title: Computer Science Fundamentals
skills.description: Strong foundation in data structures and algorithms through coursework. Excited to apply these concepts to solve complex problems in software development.

skills.title: Version Control & Collaboration
skills.description: Basic proficiency with Git and GitHub. Keen to gain more experience in collaborative development environments and best practices.

skills.title: Soft Skills
skills.description: Strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication (including multilingual capabilities), and enthusiasm for learning new technologies and methodologies.

portfolio.title: TrackXpense- Full-Stack Expense Tracker (In Progress)
portfolio.description: A web application for personal finance management, built with Python/Flask (backend) and HTML/CSS (frontend). Features include user authentication, expense logging, and basic budget planning. Uses SQLite for data storage and implements RESTful APIs for frontend-backend communication.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce WebApp
portfolio.description: An online store prototype developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Includes a functional shopping cart with real-time updates, a basic product catalog, and simulated order processing. Utilizes local storage to maintain cart data between sessions.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A responsive portfolio site created with React and Node.js. Showcases projects and skills using a component-based structure for easier maintenance. Designed to be viewable on various devices, presenting professional information in a clear, accessible format.
